message.body: Hey - do you want me to pick you up for the studio tonight? Thomasin said there are emails about a young person who is mugging people around the coop/studio area.
I might already be there. Not quite sure yet but I'll text you closer to 8 and let you know. Will def take a ride home!
I read that online so scary!
Great! Thomasin said the person who has been doing the mugging/assaults says he is from Detroit and looking for directions. So just be safe.
Okay I will. I'm not walking alone anywhere ever. One of thenassaults happened at 11:30 AM
Hey! I'm at the studio but I forgot a tape.
Oh wait I have some. Nevermind
Still laughing thinking about those videos! Thanks for all your help tonight - really owe you pizza now!
I'm taking them off the phone for you now!! I wish I were more helpful for real tho.
So funny! The Craigslist person lives at 49th and Springfield! A neighbor!
Mix is letting me send them a HD file and they will fix it for me!! :)
